page.title: 03HOME LIFE. MEMOIRS.
page.content: Matthew...I can remember there was a fire in Ridgmont Road,and two fire engines and an ambulance came.An old widow lived there.Nobody was hurt.I went for a walk to see it, all up the front had got burnt and some of the side too. Robert....Every morning the milkman comes in a float, and he has crates at the back of the float. He puts our milk bottles by the front or back door. Jaime....I'll always remember my brother taking me and Amy up Bunny hill,and making a Buttercup chain.Bunny hill is very steep. People have picnics there.We rolled down the hill.My brother kicked my football down and we had to go and get it.
